root.title: Azure Application Deleted
root.description: Identifies when a application is deleted in Azure.
root.author: Austin Songer @austinsonger

falsepositives.item: Application being deleted may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Application deleted from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
